summary: Iteration 9 - Frontend-only testing for landing page theme styling. All requested features verified working: dark theme default, theme toggle, light theme visibility for all sections.
passed_tests: Landing page loads in dark theme by default (localStorage: 'dark', HTML class: 'dark', bg-[#09090b])
Theme toggle button visible and functional (Sun icon in dark mode, Moon in light mode)
Theme toggle switches correctly (dark -> light: classes and localStorage updated)
Hero section text always white/light (dark gradient overlay) - correct by design
About section light theme: heading rgb(17,24,39), paragraph rgb(75,85,99), bg rgb(243,244,246) - all readable
Services section light theme: bg rgb(255,255,255), title rgb(17,24,39), cards have bg-gray-50 with shadow - all readable
Contact section light theme: heading rgb(17,24,39), bg rgb(243,244,246) - readable
Theme toggle back to dark works correctly

dark_theme_default.details: localStorage='dark', HTML class='dark', main div has 'bg-[#09090b] text-white'

theme_toggle.details: Button switches theme, updates localStorage and HTML classes correctly

light_theme_hero.details: Hero maintains dark gradient overlay so text stays white - this is by design

light_theme_services.details: White background, dark text (rgb(17,24,39)), cards have bg-gray-50 with shadows

light_theme_about.details: Gray-100 background, dark heading, gray-600 paragraph text - good contrast

light_theme_contact.details: Gray-100 background, dark heading, proper contrast

light_theme_trainers.details: Gray-100 background with proper card styling

context_for_next_testing_agent: Theme styling fully working. Dark theme is default for new users. Light theme has proper contrast with dark text on light backgrounds for About, Services, Contact sections. Hero section maintains dark overlay so text is always white/light which is correct by design.

mocked_apis.razorpay: Razorpay payment gateway integration is MOCKED
